post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Investment Administration Sciences

IA Sciences provides premium business process outsourcing (BPO) of front-, mid- and back-office administrative services for investment counsel, fund companies and investment dealers.

Our core business activities include consulting and development of Individually Managed Account programs for sponsor organizations, out-sourced individually-managed account administration programs and business process re-engineering and operational reviews.

For more information on Investment Administration Sciences, please visit: www.iasciences.com

Position Responsibilities:

Work with Business Analysts to prepare technical specifications for operational flow and control applications;
Application development/maintenance;
Database administration and operations support.

Qualifications:

At least three years experience in application development / systems analysis in the financial services sector;
Web based development using MS Visual Studio 6.0 (Interdev) and .NET ;
MS SQL Server based development and administration;
MS Access;
Visual Basic;
Crystal Reports;
Completion of the Canadian Securities Course would be helpful;

Application Submission:

If you feel you are an ideal candidate for this position, please e-mail your resume in confidence to: Manager Human Resources HR@iasciences.com.

We thank all applicants for your interest, however only those candidates selected for an interview will be be contacted.


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
Ref Code: IAS-5  

Contact Information
HR@iasciences.com
Investment Administration Sciences Inc.
60 Yonge Street, Suite 1100
Toronto Ontario M5E 1H5
post.title: Database Analyst / Developer
